headline: The 3 auto supplier stocks this portfolio mgr. is watching
summary: Gabelli Funds Portfolio Manager Brian Sponheimer discusses why he is watching these three auto supplier stocks: Dana Incorporated (DAN), Garrett Motion (GTX), and Aptiv (APTV). Also catch Brian Sponheimer explain how automakers like Ford (F) and General Motors (GM) are holding up in 2025 despite tariff impacts. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
